import React, { useRef } from 'react'; import Slider from 'react-slick'; import '../styles/Carousel.css'; // Import the CSS file for styling import 'slick-carousel/slick/slick.css'; // Import slick CSS import 'slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css'; // Import slick theme CSS const Carousel = () => { const sliderRef = useRef(null); // Create a ref for the slider const settings = { dots: true, infinite: true, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 1, // Show one image at a time slidesToScroll: 1, autoplay: true, autoplaySpeed: 2000, }; return (
); }; export default Carousel;
